title: Unexpected Welfare Check by Sussex Police
summary: Two Sussex Police officers (Amy EA734 and Sam EA820) conduct an in-person, unannounced welfare check on Ben Carter, citing concern over his demeanor on a phone call the previous day. Ben immediately documents their names and badge numbers. The officers note they have no phone signal at the location.

quotes.quote: This is a welfare check on you check if you...
Okay. What are your names?... What are your badge numbers?
I can't get signal on my phone here for some reason.
